Option.Title: Select test option
Option.Lable: 0: Interactive Short; 1: Auto Short; 2: Interactive Full; 3: Auto Full

Option.Title: Select Power Cycle Method
Option.Lable: 0: ULINK Power Control for SATA/SAS Device; 1: ULINK Power Control for PCIe Device; 2: Others

Option.Title: Power Interruption Test with Data Compare
Power Interruption Test with Data Compare
Option.Lable: Select commands for test (0: both DMA and NCQ; 1: DMA only; 2: NCQ only)

Option.Title: Power Interruption Test with Data Compare
Option.Lable: Max. # of Loop for DMA Test

Option.Title: Power Interruption Test with Data Compare
Option.Lable: Max. # of Loop for NCQ Test

Option.Title: Power Interruption Test with Data Compare
Power Interruption Test with Data Compare
Option.Lable: Power On Ready (POR) Timeout Value (in second)

Option.Title: Power Interruption Test with Data Compare
Option.Lable: Display command info during Good Data Writing? (0:No, 1:Only WrCmd, 2:All Cmds)

Option.Title: Power Interruption Test with Data Compare
Option.Lable: Display command info during powering off? (0:No, 1:Only WrCmd, 2:All Cmds)

Option.Title: Select test option
Option.Lable: 0: Interactive Short; 1: Auto Short; 2: Interactive Full; 3: Auto Full

Option.Title: Select Power Cycle Method
Option.Lable: 0: ULINK Power Control for SATA/SAS Device; 1: ULINK Power Control for PCIe Device; 2: Others

Option.Title: Select test option
Option.Lable: 0: Interactive w/Brief; 1: Auto w/Brief; 2: Interactive w/Detail; 3: Auto w/Detail; 4: Halt when Failed (default: 4)

Option.Title: Select Power Cycle Method
Option.Lable: 0: ULINK Power Control for SATA/SAS Device; 1: ULINK Power Control for PCIe Device; 2: Others

Option.Title: NCQ
Option.Lable: Please select the valid test case ID in the range [ 0 :8 ]:
